Room.Name: Lankshire Parkway
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Lankshire Parkway, east of the Iilandi Mansion.
Room.LongDescription: The large Iilandi Mansion is located to the west. The Iilandi Family owns much of the farming properties in Oceancrest, working them up from mere plots of land to the comodity producers that they are today. On the east side of the road is the Allisk Manor, home of Natasha de Allisk, one of the last known vampires in the lands.
